messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] signature lines was (unknown)
messages.msgSnippet: Many people put  quotes or phrases that tell a little about the person and their interests. It s called a signature line. My interpretation of that one is that
messages.messageBody:
Many people put quotes or phrases that tell a little about the person and
their interests. It's called a signature line.
My interpretation of that one is that the person is Pagan (a nature based
religion based on ancient tradition) and has a great sense of humor!
BTW, I saw a bumpersticker recently that says
"Sorry I haven't been to church lately, I was busy practicing witchcraft and
becoming a lesbian." LOL
~Elissa Cleaveland
"It is nothing short of a miracle that the modern methods of instruction
have
not yet entirely strangled the holy curiosity of inquiry." A. Einstein
